p: To elucidate the functional role of Fab1, we disrupted fab1 by gene replacement mutagenesis using a fusion PCR approach ( Fig. S4A). Mutant (∆fab1) and complementation (∆fab1::fab1) strains of A. flavus were generated and validated by PCR and sequencing ( Fig. S4B). We also confirmed whether fab1 was expressed in these strains via northern blotting ( Figure 1(c)). In order to verify the fab1 3’ untranslated region (UTR), total A. flavus RNA was subjected to a 3’-RACE (rapid amplification of cDNA ends) experiment and the resultant 3’-RACE PCR product was sequenced to verify the splicing sites and poly(A) tail of fab1 ( Figure 1(d,e)).
